Name: Quartz
About the game: QUARTZ offers a VR toolkit dedicated to illustration and art exhbition. Thanks to a panel of intuitive and complete tools, it lets you create, share and visualize artworks in virtual reality. You can paint whatever you want on all kinds of canvases in different environments and exhibit your creations in your virtual gallery. Create Select one of the 3D canvases and start painting from your own sketch or a blank page. With spray, marker, stencil and eraser tools, you have everything you need to create whatever you want. Combine them with a brush to open your style, use color charts or create your own to unleash your creativity! Exhibit More than a painting software, Quartz lets you create your own gallery. Exhibit your works and watch the creation process thanks to the replay mode. Import your artworks created from-third party software (png, jpeg) to share them in a virtual world. Share Export your works to use them whatever you want. Get inspired and improve your skills by watching community creations. Follow your favorite artists, works and exhibitions. Create your profile and expand your community! Key features Painting simulator Import 2D artworks and sketches Export artwork from Quartz Virtual gallery and replay Social interactions
